PainterSettings
public sealed
PainterSettings

Graph painter settings.

Properties
PositiveWeightColor
public Color PositiveWeightColor { get }

Positive connection weight color.

NegativeWeightColor
public Color NegativeWeightColor { get }

Negative connection weight color.

NodeDiameter
public float NodeDiameter { get }

Node diameter.

NodeBorderColor
public Color NodeBorderColor { get }

Node border color.

NodeFillColor
public Color NodeFillColor { get }

Node fill color.

NodeLabelColor
public Color NodeLabelColor { get }

Node label color.

NodeLabelFont
public Font NodeLabelFont { get }

Font for drawing node ID text on the viewport.

ConnectionWeightRange
public float ConnectionWeightRange { get }

Expected/nominal range of connection weights. Used to determine width of drawn connections.
